entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 6.
